alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet; Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 28 at 3:22PM MST until March 01 at 11:00PM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 11 PM MST WEDNESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. For the High Wind Watch, west winds 30 to 50 mph with gusts up to 85 mph possible. * WHERE...Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet and East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, from 8 AM to 11 PM MST Wednesday. For the High Wind Watch, from Wednesday evening through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet; Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet
